mapper.select: SELECT SAP_PD_DV_CD AS CODE_ID /*SAP상품구분코드*/ , SAP_PD_DV_NM AS CODE_NAME /*SAP상품항목코드*/ FROM TB_CBCL_SAP_PD_DV_CD WHERE SAP_BZ_TERY_CD = DECODE(#{session.tenantId}, 'TNT_EDU', '1110', '1210') /*WELLS*/ AND SAP_PD_ATC_CD = '00' /*상품항목 00 - SAP상품코드인건, 01부터는 SAP항목코드*/ GROUP BY SAP_PD_DV_CD , SAP_PD_DV_NM ORDER BY SAP_PD_DV_CD

SELECT SELL_TP_CD /*판매유형코드*/ , SELL_TP_DTL_CD /*판매유형상세*/ , DG_CST_ID /*대표고객ID*/ , (SELECT MAX(SAP_PD_DV_NM) FROM TB_CBCL_SAP_PD_DV_CD WHERE SAP_PD_DV_CD = T1.SAP_PD_DV_CD) AS SAP_PD_DV_NM /*SAP상품구분코드명*/ , BASE_YM /*기준년월*/ , SUM(SL_BND_ALRPY_AMT) AS SL_BND_ALRPY_AMT /*채권반제금액*/ , SL_BND_ALRPY_SLIP_TRS_NO /*매출채권반제전표전송번호*/ , SAP_ALRPY_SLPNO /*SAP반제전표번호*/ , SUM(DP_BLAM) AS DP_BLAM /*반제 후 입금잔액*/ , SUM(UC_AMT) AS UC_AMT /*매출채권잔액*/ FROM TB_CBCL_SL_BND_ALRPY_BAS T1 /*채권반제기본*/ WHERE 1=1 AND KW_GRP_CO_CD = '2000' /*교원그룹회사코드 - 프라퍼티 고정*/ AND BASE_YM = #{baseYm} /*기준년월*/ AND ((#{dpKndCd} = '1' AND SELL_TP_CD = '1' ) /*일시불*/ OR (#{dpKndCd} = '5' AND RVE_DV_CD = '02') /*연체가산금*/ OR (#{dpKndCd} = '2' AND SELL_TP_CD <> '1' AND RVE_DV_CD <> '02' )) /*일시불도 아니고 연체가산금도 아닌거 */
AND CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} /*계약번호*/ AND CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} /*계약상세번호*/
AND SAP_ALRPY_SLPNO = #{sapAlrpySlpno} /*SAP반제전표번호*/
AND SAP_PD_DV_CD = #{sapPdDvCd} /*SAP상품구분코드*/
GROUP BY SELL_TP_CD, SELL_TP_DTL_CD, SAP_PD_DV_CD, DG_CST_ID, BASE_YM, SL_BND_ALRPY_SLIP_TRS_NO, SAP_ALRPY_SLPNO ORDER BY SELL_TP_CD, SELL_TP_DTL_CD, SAP_PD_DV_CD, DG_CST_ID

SELECT SELL_TP_CD /*판매유형코드*/ , SELL_TP_DTL_CD /*판매유형상세*/ , (SELECT MAX(SAP_PD_DV_NM) FROM TB_CBCL_SAP_PD_DV_CD WHERE SAP_PD_DV_CD = T1.SAP_PD_DV_CD) AS SAP_PD_DV_NM /*SAP상품구분코드명*/ , DG_CST_ID /*대표고객ID*/ , BASE_YM /*기준년월*/ , CNTR_NO || CNTR_SN AS CNTR_NO /*계약번호 + 계약일련번호 => 계약상세번호*/ , (SELECT MAX(CST_KNM) FROM TB_CUBS_CST_BAS WHERE CST_NO = T1.CST_NO ) AS CST_KNM /*고객명*/ , SL_BND_ALRPY_DT /*채권반제일자*/ , SL_BND_ALRPY_AMT /*채권반제금액*/ , SL_BND_ALRPY_SLIP_TRS_NO /*매출채권반제전표전송번호*/ , SAP_ALRPY_SLPNO /*SAP반제전표번호*/ , RVE_NO /*수납번호*/ , RVE_SN /*수납일련번호*/ , DP_CL_DT /*수납일자 - 입금마감일자*/ , RVE_AMT /*수납금액*/ , SAP_DP_SLPNO /*SAP입금전표번호*/ , DP_BLAM /*반제 후 입금잔액*/ , SL_RCOG_DT /*채권발생일자*/ , SL_BND_OC_AMT /*채권발생금액*/ , SAP_SL_SLPNO /*SAP매출전표번호*/ , UC_AMT /*매출채권잔액*/ FROM TB_CBCL_SL_BND_ALRPY_BAS T1 /*채권반제기본*/ WHERE KW_GRP_CO_CD = '2000' /*교원그룹회사코드 - 프라퍼티 고정*/ AND BASE_YM = #{baseYm} /*기준년월*/ AND ((#{dpKndCd} = '1' AND SELL_TP_CD = '1' ) /*일시불*/ OR (#{dpKndCd} = '5' AND RVE_DV_CD = '02') /*연체가산금*/ OR (#{dpKndCd} = '2' AND SELL_TP_CD <> '1' AND RVE_DV_CD <> '02' )) /*일시불도 아니고 연체가산금도 아닌거 */
AND CNTR_NO = #{cntrNo} /*계약번호*/ AND CNTR_SN = #{cntrSn} /*계약상세번호*/
AND SAP_ALRPY_SLPNO = #{sapAlrpySlpno} /*SAP반제전표번호*/
AND SAP_PD_DV_CD = #{sapPdDvCd} /*SAP상품구분코드*/
ORDER BY SELL_TP_CD, SELL_TP_DTL_CD, SAP_PD_DV_CD, DG_CST_ID, CNTR_NO, CNTR_SN

SELECT SELL_TP_CD /*판매유형코드*/ , SELL_TP_DTL_CD /*판매유형상세*/ , SAP_ALRPY_SLPNO /*SAP반제전표번호*/ , SL_BND_ALRPY_AMT /*채권반제금액*/ , (SELECT BKTXT FROM TB_IFIN_DP_SLIP_BAS WHERE BELNR = T1.SAP_ALRPY_SLPNO) AS BKTXT /*전표적요*/ FROM TB_CBCL_SL_BND_ALRPY_BAS T1 /*채권반제기본*/ WHERE 1=1 AND SAP_ALRPY_SLPNO = #{sapAlrpySlpno} ORDER BY SELL_TP_CD, SELL_TP_DTL_CD, SAP_ALRPY_SLPNO

UPDATE TB_CBCL_SL_BND_ALRPY_BAS /*반제기본테이블*/ SET SL_BND_ALRPY_SLIP_TRS_NO = '' , SAP_ALRPY_SLPNO = '' , SAP_SLIP_MSG = ''
WHERE SAP_ALRPY_SLPNO = #{sapAlrpySlpno}

UPDATE TB_IFIN_DP_SLIP_BAS /*입금전표테이블*/ SET BKTXT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')||'반제취소' /*적요*/ , BELNR = '' /*SAP전표번호*/ , STBLG = '' /*SAP역분개전표*/ , MESSGE = '' /*SAP전표메시지*/ , ZFCGUB = 'Y' , FIMYMD = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD') , FIMHMS = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'HH24MISS') WHERE BELNR = #{sapAlrpySlpno}
